about_the_game:
Urban Explorer is a first-person exploration game with elements of parkour and puzzles.
Follow the footsteps of the masters, evade security, and remember the golden rule: take only photos, leave only footprints! Your photographs can earn recognition within the community and place you at the top of the leaderboard.



Utilize special equipment such as a flashlight, camera, and gas mask. Your parkour skills, outsmarting guards, and gear will allow you to safely access forbidden areas. Worried about what you'll encounter on your journey? Choose the difficulty level that suits you best.

TAKE PICTURES
The photographs you take can earn recognition within the community and place you at the top of the leaderboard. Stay true to the #1 Urbex rule "take only pictures, leave only footprints behind" and capture places lost in time.



USE YOUR EQUIPMENT
Utilize special equipment such as a flashlight, camera, and gas mask. Use lockpicks to enter restricted areas. Your parkour skills, outsmarting guards, and gear will allow you to safely access forbidden areas.



PREPARE YOURSELF
Before going on a mission, you’ll be able to study intel available on the facility to get to know the threats that could await you. You can also choose the difficulty level that suits you best. Remember to equip yourself properly and you will get back safely.

USE PARKOUR SKILLS
You’ll often have to use your parkour abilities to avoid security or access areas that, at first glance, seem inaccessible. Couple this with the appropriate equipment and there’s no place you can’t slip in!

CHALLENGES
Thanks to the day and night system, the ability to revisit locations, new challenges and fresh clues you'll uncover will provide you with the opportunity to thoroughly explore the maps' mysteries.

If you love exploration and post-apo theme is your jam – you’ll find all of this in Urban Explorer.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.

name: Urban Explorer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 / Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core / Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.

short_description: Urban Explorer is a first-person exploration game with parkour and puzzles. Explore abandoned buildings, top secret facilities, factories and basements. Use your skills to discover unknown secrets and leave unnoticed. Remember: Take only photos, leave only footprints!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
